function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in following physical distancing norms in urban public spaces","Impact":"Increased transmission of Covid-19 due to large crowds in public spaces","Mitigation":"Reorganizing the layout of public spaces to allow for physical distancing, limiting the number of people allowed in at a time","Technologies":"Smart crowd management systems, automated people counting systems","People":"General public, shoppers, vendors","Owner":"Local authorities, market management"},{"Description":"Inability to enforce public norms and regulations in heavily dense urban areas","Impact":"Higher risk of Covid-19 transmission due to non-compliance with preventive measures","Mitigation":"Increase public awareness and education, provide resources for compliance, enforce penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Digital signage for public messaging, mobile apps for health alerts and guidelines","People":"Residents, workers, government officials","Owner":"Local government, community leaders"},{"Description":"Economic impact of shutting down public spaces in densely populated areas","Impact":"Collapse of market economy and loss of livelihoods for vendors and workers","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety measures while allowing limited operations, provide financial support to affected businesses and workers","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering and delivery platforms","People":"Vendors, workers, consumers","Owner":"Local government, market associations"}]}
